alert.note: Alert for Bon Homme; Hutchinson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 2:16AM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BON HOMME...WESTERN YANKTON AND SOUTHEASTERN HUTCHINSON COUNTIES... At 315 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tyndall, moving east at 25 mph. Another severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northwest of Scotland, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Scotland around 330 AM CDT. Tabor around 335 AM CDT. Utica around 350 AM CDT. Lewis And Clark State Recreation Area around 355 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Lesterville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
